response.summary:
Industrial Engineer with experience in the Human Resources and Billing Accounting area in the Oil, Gas and Energy industry, also in Technology and Tax & Accounting industries. 

I’m a professional with high analytic skills, results oriented, good teamwork, continuous improvement mindset, Agile framework, customer centricity and people first oriented, innovative thinking and always seeking to learn more.
response.skills: Trello, HubSpot, Workpuls / Insightful, Vonage, RingCentral, Okta Administration, SAP Successfactors, MySQL, Agile Methodologies, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power BI, SAP Products, Gestión de proyectos, Derivatives, Microsoft Office, SAP HR, Visio, Trabajo en equipo, Inglés, Bizagy

profile_positions.description:
Collaborate with management and team leads to assess short-and long-term BI & MIS projects.
Manage a team of internal and external systems consultants throughout research, implementations, maintenance, and support projects.
Collaborate with Automation and Infrastructure teams by providing data and technical expertise from a scientific and practical perspective.
Respond to technical inquiries and perform systems administrator tasks using company ERP and HXM systems.
Assist management to maintain innovation targets by providing ideas and resources.
Document processes and updating the internal website with system tech tips and documents
Create ad-hoc reports in Excel/Power BI/ERP/HXM
Evaluate systems performance through assessing usage of existing tools and suggesting improvements
Preparing reference material for users by drafting operation instructions.
Help maintain staff and client confidence by communicating courteously, confidently, privately, and correctly.
Continuously monitor workload and collect relevant staff and common query data, while identifying and evaluating options to suggesting improvement.
Maintain conscientious approach oriented to help team members improve performance through training and innovation
profile_positions.title: Operations Engineer

profile_positions.description: The Billing Accountant is responsible for providing timely and accurate processing of customer invoices, and perform secondary audit of other Billing team member’s posted invoices, conducting statement audits and problem resolutions.
profile_positions.title: Billing Accountant
West Hemisphere Human Resources Processes and Systems Analyst

company.name: H&CO USA
company.description:
At H&CO we help individuals and organizations to conquer new frontiers by providing first-class international professional services. 
We are an accounting firm present in more than 14 countries with more than 500 people committed to providing quality services in Accounting, International Taxes, SAP Business One implementation, Global Entity Management, Staffing, Payroll, among others.
